parameters.Stopped: 0: The local audio is in the initial state. The SDK reports this state in the case of LocalMuted, RemoteMuted or RemoteOffline.

parameters.Starting: 1: The first remote audio packet is received.

parameters.Decoding: 2: The remote audio stream is decoded and plays normally. The SDK reports this state in the case of NetworkRecovery, LocalUnmuted or RemoteUnmuted.

parameters.Frozen: 3: The remote audio is frozen. The SDK reports this state in the case of NetworkCongestion.

parameters.Failed: 4: The remote audio fails to start. The SDK reports this state in the case of Internal.
